channel.description: Recent content in virt on Let's talk about ...

item.title: Libosinfo (Part I)
item.description: This is the first blog post of a series which will cover Libosinfo, what it is, who uses it, how it is used, how to manage it, and, finally, how to contribute to it. A quick overview Libosinfo is the operating system information database. As a project, it consists of three different parts, with the goal to provide a single place containing all the required information about an operating system in order to provision and manage it in a virtualized environment.
